feed.title: Flink Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Flink: 0.0.1 / Sonia
entry.content:
First official public release of flink.

Features

  • ğŸš€ get a production-grade flink instance up and running in less then 1 minute
  • ğŸ“± easy generation of QR Codes for shortened links
  • âŒ¨ï¸ batch short link creation from your terminal (using curl, wget or any other board util)
  • ğŸ˜ swagger (OpenAPI) interface allowing you to build on top of flink
  • ğŸ³ deployable as container (podman and docker)
  • ğŸ“ˆ keep track of how often short links are visited through built-in Prometheus support

entry.title: New release for Flink: 0.1.0 / Amy
entry.content:
The flink release series continues! The second official flink release ships with a simple minimalistic UI that you can easily access from your browser for everyday usage

Changelog

  • â¬†ï¸ bump dependencies (and mitigate CVE-2024-32028)

entry.title: New release for Flink: 1.0.0 / Manic
entry.content:
flink has received a lot of love in the past few weeks. After extensive testing, now it is time to announce v1.0.0 - the first rock-solid version that "just works".

Changelog

  • â†•ï¸ add support for QR code generation in different sizes (using ?height query param)
  • ğŸ—ƒï¸ add meta data extractor (using opengraph, HTML meta tags)
  • ğŸŒ add HTTP API endpoint to get extracted Meta Data as JSON
  • ğŸªª add link preview generator (that can be embedded as iframe)
  • ğŸ’¾ support for Sqlite, MySQL/MariaDB and PostgreSQL

entry.title: New release for Flink: 2.0.0 / Silver
entry.content:
It's a while since v1.0.0 was released, many features have been implemented since then, some minor bugs were fixed. Now it's time for v2.0.0. Here's a short overview of the awesome things that went into 2.0.0

Changelog

Features

  • ğŸŸ spam protection using EasyList blocklists
  • ğŸ” add default-theme capability to drop/remove tracking query parameters)
  • ğŸ—‘ï¸ add ability to DELETE flinkified Links
  • ğŸ“ˆ add statistics page
  • ğŸ” add authentication /metrics and /stats
  • â¤ï¸ implement support for the custom themes
  • â­• add option to disable metrics completely
  • âœ¨ default-theme improvements (loading indicator for embeds, styling)
  • ğŸ‘€ improve SEO for default-theme
  • ğŸ”¥ introduced Scalar API documentation
  • 3ï¸âƒ£ bumped to OpenAPI 3.0
  • 9ï¸âƒ£ bumped to dotnet 9
  • ğŸ›¡ï¸ include strict CSP (Content-Security-Policy) for all themes

Others

  • ğŸ“š documentation for hosting with docker, docker-compose, and kubernetes
  • â¤ï¸ add list of community install guides

entry.title: New release for Flink: 2.1.0 / Knuckles
entry.content:
v2.1.0 (Codename: Knuckles) is a big release with a set of new features and lots of added benefits. Took a while to implement them, but now we're ready to launch ğŸš€

Changelog

Features

  • ğŸ” Password protected Links
  • ğŸ—“ï¸ expiration time for Links (after which a Link is not accessible anymore)
  • ğŸ—“ï¸ activation time for Links (Link is not accessible before that point in time)
  • ğŸ“ default theme gained the option to change the length of the short link
  • ğŸŒ improvements with Screen Readers (accessibility, ARIA improvements) on the Default-Theme
  • ğŸ†” default theme supports setting preferredId (you tell Flink which slug it should use)

Others

  • ğŸ§® native release builds contain checksums now
  • ğŸ§® native release builds for almost all platforms and CPU architectures
  • ğŸªŸ win-x64
  • ğŸªŸ win-x86
  • ğŸªŸ win-arm64
  • ğŸ osx-x64
  • ğŸ osx-arm64
  • ğŸ§ linux-x64
  • ğŸ§ linux-musl-x64
  • ğŸ§ linux-musl-arm64
  • ğŸ§ linux-arm
  • ğŸ§ linux-arm64
  • ğŸ‹ support for ARM Docker Container builds (multi-arch manifests)
